title: [Duskruin Arena, Entrance]
description: A long row if crossbows line the upper wall over evenly spaced suits of armor that line the passageway, each positioned to hold its weapon as if on guard duty.  The hall curves with the arch of the inner arena, burning iron sconces lighting the way.
